name: Space Blast (F0RC0D3D)
description:
You approach upon a rusty old arcade, and inside was an old arcade machine. You plug it back in and the Title Screen opened. There seemed to already be a coin stuck inside. You take it out and put it back in. Then the game starts. And as the Game loads, you feel immersed. 

Destroy the Evil Robo Gunner !  But in Front of him is his army.  He has already separated his Spaceship, so you'll have to cross all of them, and the space in between! And there are a lot of ASTEROIDS! Hopefully we chose the right space soldier, because this will be very difficult.
